simulated_ratings.title: Blade Runner (1982)
simulated_ratings.feeling: The smoky futurism and aching questions about what makes us human completely draw me in.

simulated_ratings.feeling: A harrowing yet profoundly human dystopia that left me tense and moved.

simulated_ratings.title: Arrival (2016)
simulated_ratings.feeling: Its patient, cerebral approach to contact and language really resonated emotionally with me.

simulated_ratings.feeling: Tender and thoughtful, though a touch too wispy for me to be fully swept away.

simulated_ratings.feeling: The blend of brutal history and lyrical myth is devastating and beautiful.
